'company': 'Aselsan', 'description': 'Tasks and Responsibilities:  
• Meeting with customers to generate the requirements specification document of the electro optical systems.
• Preparing the system requirements specification (SRS) document, system interface control document (ICD), System Test Document (STD).
• Coordinating the colleagues from various disciplines such as mechanical engineering, electronics engineering, software, production and quality departments.
• Integration of multiple subsystems such as infrared detectors, day sights, laser range finders, optics, coolers, control and power PCBAs and harnesses.
• Executing tests to validate the designed systems in terms of optical and system level performances such as functional tests and ESS tests (temperature cycling, humidity, vibration, shock etc.)
• Writing technical reports for project managers and clients.
• Attending supplier meetings.
• Supporting project managers in tendering from technical point of view.
• Presenting and demonstrating electro-optical systems to the customers and end users.
 
Achieved Projects:
As a systems engineer, I have achieved the requirement management, integration, verification, validation and qualification of the systems in the following projects:
• Long Range Cooled Surveillance Thermal Camera Series(currently being used in more than 5 different countries)
• Dual Band Thermal Camera for Laser Designator (currently being used in Turkey and a European country)
• Anti-Tank Thermal Camera (currently being used in 2 different Middle East Countries.)
• Thermal Camera for Tank Commander and Gunner Periscopes (currently being used in 4 different Eurasian countries)
• Driver vision system of  Turkish Main Battle Tank -ALTAY and M60 Tank Modernization (currently being used in Turkey)
• Electro optical systems-consisting of thermal camera, day-tv and lrf- for Remote Weapon Stations. (currently being used in more than 10 different countries )', 'title': 'Electro Optical Systems Engineer,MSc.', 'employment_type': None}]}]
